analysis.description:
AbstractSale.withdraw (/unique_chucks/15/0xca6bfff19a5b5504d03945897907e78f5fc9287b.sol#327-339) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- _to.transfer(_value) (/unique_chucks/15/0xca6bfff19a5b5504d03945897907e78f5fc9287b.sol#333)
AbstractSale.toBytes20 (/unique_chucks/15/0xca6bfff19a5b5504d03945897907e78f5fc9287b.sol#315-322) is declared view but contains assembly code

Eticket4Sale (/unique_chucks/15/0xca6bfff19a5b5504d03945897907e78f5fc9287b.sol#404-480) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/15/0xca6bfff19a5b5504d03945897907e78f5fc9287b.sol#471-480)

PublicSale.getTimeBonus (/unique_chucks/15/0xca6bfff19a5b5504d03945897907e78f5fc9287b.sol#547-561) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- interval == 0
	- interval == 1
	- interval == 2 || interval == 3
	- interval == 2 || interval == 3

ERC20ReceiveAdapter.receive (/unique_chucks/15/0xca6bfff19a5b5504d03945897907e78f5fc9287b.sol#218-230) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(msg.sender,this,_value) (/unique_chucks/15/0xca6bfff19a5b5504d03945897907e78f5fc9287b.sol#226-227)

AbstractSale.withdraw (/unique_chucks/15/0xca6bfff19a5b5504d03945897907e78f5fc9287b.sol#327-339) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-Token(_token).transfer(_to,_value) (/unique_chucks/15/0xca6bfff19a5b5504d03945897907e78f5fc9287b.sol#334-335)

MintingSale.doPurchase (/unique_chucks/15/0xca6bfff19a5b5504d03945897907e78f5fc9287b.sol#362-366) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(buyer,sold.add(bonus)) (/unique_chucks/15/0xca6bfff19a5b5504d03945897907e78f5fc9287b.sol#366)

Reentrancy in Eticket4Sale.transfer (/unique_chucks/15/0xca6bfff19a5b5504d03945897907e78f5fc9287b.sol#471-480):
	External calls:
	- doPurchase(beneficiary,amount,0) (/unique_chucks/15/0xca6bfff19a5b5504d03945897907e78f5fc9287b.sol#472)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- cap (/unique_chucks/15/0xca6bfff19a5b5504d03945897907e78f5fc9287b.sol#476-478)

Reentrancy in Eticket4Sale.transferWithBonus (/unique_chucks/15/0xca6bfff19a5b5504d03945897907e78f5fc9287b.sol#459-471):
	External calls:
	- doPurchase(beneficiary,amount,bonus) (/unique_chucks/15/0xca6bfff19a5b5504d03945897907e78f5fc9287b.sol#464-465)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- cap (/unique_chucks/15/0xca6bfff19a5b5504d03945897907e78f5fc9287b.sol#466-470)

AbstractSale.toBytes20 uses assembly (/unique_chucks/15/0xca6bfff19a5b5504d03945897907e78f5fc9287b.sol#315-322)
	- /unique_chucks/15/0xca6bfff19a5b5504d03945897907e78f5fc9287b.sol#319-322
ReadOnlyToken.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/15/0xca6bfff19a5b5504d03945897907e78f5fc9287b.sol#103)
Pausable.pause (/unique_chucks/15/0xca6bfff19a5b5504d03945897907e78f5fc9287b.sol#46-52) should be declared external
